segments.text: I'm phoning about the factory visit next Friday . What should I do when I arrive ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Park in the visitors ' car park in front of the factory and then go to the gatehouse . It's directly opposite the entrance to the car park . The Security people will sign you in and give you a visitor's badge . My assistant will come down to meet you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , thanks . Look forward to seeing you on Friday , then .
segments.speaker: S1
